mapper.insert: insert into doctor (system_id, doc_province, doc_city, doc_hospital, doc_room, doc_name, doc_date, doc_phone, doc_sum_patient, doc_inc_patient, doc_sum_money, doc_inc_money, doc_file, doc_tag) values (#{systemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{docProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docHospital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docRoom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docSumPatient,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{docIncPatient,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{docSumMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{docIncMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{docFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docTag,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update doctor set doc_province = #{docProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doc_city = #{docCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doc_hospital = #{docHospital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doc_room = #{docRoom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doc_name = #{docName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doc_date = #{docDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doc_phone = #{docPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doc_sum_patient = #{docSumPatient,jdbcType=BIGINT}, doc_inc_patient = #{docIncPatient,jdbcType=INTEGER}, doc_sum_money = #{docSumMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, doc_inc_money = #{docIncMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, doc_file = #{docFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doc_tag = #{docTag,jdbcType=TINYINT} where system_id = #{systemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select system_id, doc_province, doc_city, doc_hospital, doc_room, doc_name, doc_date, doc_phone, doc_sum_patient, doc_inc_patient, doc_sum_money, doc_inc_money, doc_file, doc_tag from doctor where system_id = #{systemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select system_id, doc_province, doc_city, doc_hospital, doc_room, doc_name, doc_date, doc_phone, doc_sum_patient, doc_inc_patient, doc_sum_money, doc_inc_money, doc_file, doc_tag from doctor
